meanings.definition: Well-known or famous for being legendary or mythical.
meanings.sent1: The fabled hero saved the village from the dragon.
meanings.sent2: The fabled city of Atlantis is said to have sunk into the sea.
meanings.sent3: The children listened with wide eyes to the fabled tales of the magical forest.
meanings.sent4: In the fabled land of El Dorado, gold was said to cover the streets.
meanings.sent5: Legends speak of the fabled sword Excalibur, waiting for the true king to claim it.

meanings.sent1: The fabled creatures in the book came to life in her imagination.
meanings.sent2: The fabled treasure was hidden deep within the cave.
meanings.sent3: The fabled castle was said to be haunted by a friendly ghost.
meanings.sent4: The fabled ship sailed the seas, never docking at any port.
meanings.sent5: The fabled princess was known for her kindness and grace throughout the kingdom.

meanings.definition: Existing only in stories or legends.
meanings.sent1: The fabled unicorn was believed to have healing powers.
meanings.sent2: The fabled kingdom was said to be invisible to mortal eyes.
meanings.sent3: The fabled dragon guarded the entrance to the hidden cave.
meanings.sent4: The fabled fountain granted wishes to those who found it.
meanings.sent5: The fabled creatures of the forest danced under the moonlight.
